name: Milky Way (USBRODI GAMES)
description:
Your Wife needs Milk!

But the only place that sells that kind of life-made liquid is a galaxy away. On your way back from there, you accidentaly spilled some milk in the controlers, and now you have to make a emergency landing in some unknown planet, that MIGHT BE hostile...

Protect The Ship, protect yourself, and give some milk to your wife

INSTRUCTIONS:
A or LEFT ARROW - counter-clockwise moviment

D or RIGHT ARROW - clockwise moviment

SPACEBAR - shoot

E - construct or repair the walls

Protect the Ship and yourself from the Aliens that comes to you. When the ship is 100%, you win the game.

You don't need to repair the ship, it's in auto-repair

Use the Walls for extra protection. You're gonna need it!

Made by: USBRODI GAMES

Made for the Beginners Cicle Jam #3 by Angry Smiles
